snippet: The killings of two Guatemalans by a state sharpshooter raises many questions about policies on shooting at vehicles and the handling of human- and drug-trafficking cases.
abstract: Editorial calls for abolishing Texas' insanely permissive policy of allowing state troopers to shoot at vehicles while in pursuit, which led to deaths of two illegal immigrants; welcomes fact that a state prosecutor says he will press for grand jury investigation.
lead_paragraph: The killings of two Guatemalans by a state sharpshooter raises many questions about policies on shooting at vehicles and the handling of human- and drug-trafficking cases.

headline.seo: A Texas Injustice at the Border
